scripts.pre-release: jq '.version = "'v${FORGEJO_VERSION}-${FORGEJO_DIST_VERSION}'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && npm run linux-arm64 && npm run linux-x64 && npm update
scripts.linux-arm64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["forgejo-dist-linux-arm64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../linux-arm64 && npm run pre-release
scripts.linux-x64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["forgejo-dist-linux-x64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../linux-x64 && npm run pre-release
